healing

  • black lives matter: healing justice toolkit
  • mijente: ancestral spiritual resistence zine

“Healing must be a priority in order for a decolonized, interconnected, interdependent, intergenerational movement to truly blossom. Transforming our individual and collective trauma into a deep capacity to heal our communities strengthens our cultural (r)evolution for liberation.” — Eroc Arroyo-Montano

white supremacy

note: these resources were gathered by friends of my friend, jen, when she posted about this on the book of faces.

  • Black Women Require a Different Kind of Racial Justice Solidarity: Do you know how to be an Anti-Racism Accomplice with Black Women?
  • crossroads ministry: Continuum on Becoming an Anti-Racist Multicultural Organization
  • White Culture Handout
  • White Supremacy Culture
  • Western States Center
    • Assessing Your Organization’s Readiness and Capacity to Move a Racial Justice Agenda
    • Assessing Our Organizations – Racial Justice Assessment Tool
  • Government Alliance on Race & Equity
  • Race Forward: Racial Equity Impact Assessment Toolkit
